name: ECON 201 D100
prerequisites: ECON 103 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 113 with a minimum grade of B-; ECON 105 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 115 with a minimum grade of B-; MATH 150, MATH 151, MATH 154, or MATH 157, with a minimum grade of C-.

name: ECON 220W D100
prerequisites: ECON 201 with a minimum grade of C-, minimum 30 units and no more than 80 units.

name: ECON 260 D100
prerequisites: ECON 103 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 113 with a minimum grade of B-.

name: ECON 291 D100
prerequisites: ECON 103 or ECON 113, with a minimum grade of C-; ECON 105 or ECON 115, with a minimum grade of C-.

name: ECON 302 D100
prerequisites: ECON 201 with a minimum grade of C-; 45 units.

name: ECON 305 D100
prerequisites: ECON 201 with a minimum grade of C-; 45 units. Students with a minimum grade of A- in ECON 103 and 105 at Simon Fraser University at their first attempt can complete ECON 305 concurrently with ECON 201 after 30 units. Students seeking permission to enroll on this basis must contact the undergraduate advisor in economics.

name: ECON 325 D100
prerequisites: ECON 201 with a minimum grade of C-; 45 units.

name: ECON 333 D100
prerequisites: ECON 103 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 113 with a minimum grade of B-; ECON 105 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 115 with a minimum grade of B-; ECON 233, BUS (or BUEC) 232, STAT 270, or STAT 271, with a minimum grade of C-; MATH 150, MATH 151, MATH 154, or MATH 157, with a minimum grade of C-; 45 units. Students with a minimum grade of A- in ECON 233, BUS (or BUEC) 232, STAT 270, or STAT 271 can take ECON 333 after 30 units. Students seeking permission to enroll based on their ECON 233, BUS (or BUEC) 232, STAT 270, or STAT 271 grade must contact the undergraduate advisor in economics.

name: ECON 334 D100
prerequisites: ECON 233 or BUS 232 or STAT 270 or POL 201, with a minimum grade of C-; ECON 103 with a minimum grade of C-, or ECON 113 with a minimum grade of B-, or ECON 105 with a minimum grade of C-, or ECON 115 with a minimum grade of B-.

name: ECON 345 D100
prerequisites: ECON 103 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 113 with a minimum grade of B-; ECON 105 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 115 with a minimum grade of B-; 45 units or permission of the department.

name: ECON 355W D100
prerequisites: ECON 103 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 113 with a minimum grade of B-; ECON 105 with a minimum grade of C- or ECON 115 with a minimum grade of B-; 45 units.

name: ECON 383 D100

name: ECON 402 D100
prerequisites: ECON 302 and 331, with a minimum grade of C-. Students who have completed both MATH 232 and 251 may substitute these courses for ECON 331. Entry into this course requires a minimum CGPA of 3.0 or permission of the department.

name: ECON 410 D100
prerequisites: ECON 201 and ECON 305, all with a minimum grade of C-.

name: ECON 435 D100

name: ECON 436 D100
prerequisites: ECON 302 or ECON 305, with a minimum grade of C-.

name: ECON 446 D100
prerequisites: ECON 201, ECON 305 and ECON 345, all with a minimum grade of C-.
